message.content:
1. The AirtraqTM laryngoscope significantly reduced the IDS.
2. The mean IDS reduction with the AirtraqTM laryngoscope was -0.43 ± 0.81.
3. The mean IDS reduction with the McCoyTM laryngoscope was -1.63 ± 1.49.
4. The mean IDS reduction with the Macintosh laryngoscope was -2.23 ± 1.92.
5. The IDS reduction with the AirtraqTM laryngoscope was significantly greater than with the McCoyTM laryngoscope (P = 0.001).
6. The IDS reduction with the AirtraqTM laryngoscope was significantly greater than with the Macintosh laryngoscope (P < 0.001).
7. The AirtraqTM laryngoscope improved the Cormack-Lehane glottic view.
8. With the AirtraqTM laryngoscope, 77% of patients had a grade 1 Cormack-Lehane glottic view.
9. With the AirtraqTM laryngoscope, no patients had a grade 3 or 4 Cormack-Lehane glottic view.

messages.content:
Statement: The AirtraqTM laryngoscope significantly reduced the IDS (mean − 0.43 ± 0.81) as compared with both McCoyTM (mean − 1.63 ± 1.49, P = 0.001) and Macintosh laryngoscope (mean −2.23 ± 1.92, P < 0.001) and improved the Cormack-Lehane glottic view (77% grade 1 view and no patients with grade 3 or 4 view).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
